title: Broadcasting From The NYSE With Joe Ficalora CEO at New York Community Bank
itunes:title: Broadcasting From The NYSE With Joe Ficalora CEO at New York Community Bank
description:
Joe Ficalora, CEO at NYCB, discusses corporate citizenship as well as banking regulation. Jonathan Corpina, Senior Managing Partner at Meridian Equity Partners, shares a trader's outlook at the New York Stock Exchnage. Rob Urban, Bloomberg News Senior Financial Editor, and Sonny, Singh, Chief Commercial Officer at Bitpay, breakdown the debut of Bitcoin futures. Luke Schneider, CEO at Silvercar, talks about the business of affordable premium rental cars. And Carol and Cory hit today’s Movers and Shakers on Wall Street and Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson has his “Stock of the Day.” 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
